title: How to get rid of new message notifications for messages you have already read?
body:
So I log in and my team chat messages constantly come back up as new despite having opened the team log and reading them and the notifications going away during that particular login.

Next day I log in and the notifications are back... How do you fix this?

replies.body: Hey I know this is annoying. We believe we have a fix in the works. We're in the middle of testing and if all goes well, this could realistically get fixed sometime after 7.2 hits.

3 years later still same issue
but hey, 2020 is the year of the client right?{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
So where are we on that fix? It's getting to be almost a year and it still annoys me every day. I'm about to give up on groupchats altogether in League and stick to just Discord.

Hi,
I've got the same problem too (2019-10)
Still an issue - and not just team chats anymore... it's all chats {{champion:79}}
Same problem here. Unread messages appear everytime i start the client eventhough i read  them already.
same problem here for like 3 days its so annoying cause i have ten and im so odc i have to click everyone
Unfortunately it's still an issue. I've been seeing it for the past 10 days or so

Found this thread while searching for a resolution to this as well. Any updates on that fix? Its been a year according to timestamps on these posts, and Its quite annoying having all these notifications pop up every login.
